text:
League 1
N√Æmes - Rennes streaming: where to see the match?
N√Æmes hosts the Stade Rennais on behalf of the 12th day of Ligue 1. A poster broadcast live on French television this Saturday, November 2, 2019 from 20:00 on BeIn Sports, but also to follow live streaming on PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad or Android.
02 Nov 2019, 06:15 by Rafael Da Silva



This Saturday, the Stade Rennais moves on the lawn of N√Æmes as part of the 12th day of Ligue 1. After a series of 6 games without victories, the men of Julien St√©phan have won against Toulouse last weekend on the score of 3-2. Now 10th in Ligue 1, they will try to glean the 3 points against the Nimes, who remain on three consecutive draws in the league. 18th, the troops of Bernard Blaquart are in the obligation to win in order to leave the red zone.




N√Æmes-Rennes streaming




Gboho and Camavinga, the golden generation of Stade Rennais + 21 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This 12th day Ligue 1 poster between N√Æmes and Rennes is broadcast live on BeIn Sports (1 and 7) this Saturday, November 2nd, from 8pm. But you can also watch this match live streaming video:

Either via the subscription service (so paying) beIN Sports Connect available on PC & Mac via an Internet browser (Firefox, Chrome, Safari, etc.) but also on iPhone, iPad, Android, Xbox One, PS4, Chromecast or Apple TV.
Either from iOS and Android applications and from your TV provider (ISP or pay per view like Canal +): Orange TV, SFR TV, MyCanal ...
